name: Doctor Kids 2
description:
Seize the opportunity to become a multi-tasking doctor. Offer the highest quality medical care possible to all children and prove that they can always count on you.

Learn how to perform a surgery, use a head CT or MRI scan, diagnose anemia, heal digestive problems or fly an emergency helicopter. Use your medical skills and spread a bit of happiness to your sick little patients.

• Surgery: use surgical instruments, cut the filaments of germs and sew up the wound
• Neurology: scan a head, solve a brain puzzle and choose one of the bandages
• MRI scan: examine all organs in the body and find out which one needs healing
• Anemia: set up an infusion, eliminate viruses and put a plaster over the needle prick
• Stomach: vacuum chewing gums in the child’s stomach and pop the bubbles in the injection
• Ambulance: fly an emergency helicopter and save kids from burning skyscrapers

Kids are already waiting for your help! It’s up to you to heal them!

Features:
• practice medicine with various instruments as a real doctor
• infinite gameplay with numerous combinations
• 6 medical treatments with fun mini games
• well equipped hospital with doctor’s tools and machinery
